name: telegram-bot
description: This is a Telegram bot for mirroring files on the internet to Google Drive.

ENV.description: Setting to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in ENV mode. Don't Change !

API_ID.description: This is to Authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram Files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: This is to Authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram Files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org

OWNER_ID.description: Should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

DOWNLOAD_PATH.description: Directory where the bot downloaded files and then delete after file upload to Google Drive

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Spam Log by Bot in group. Example: -1086577357172
